chunks.text:
7C0%7C638635563893971182%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=j6QYxbybVN20mcA%2FO1rTqNybNO%2BsTzm4zVX94ZF4VjE%3D&reserved=0> 

Hi Hagop,

The European Parliament has adopted the Corporate Sustainability Due Diligence Directive (CS3D or CSDDD), requiring certain business entities and their partners (upstream and downstream) to end or mitigate adverse impacts on human rights and the environment.

This marks a significant milestone in the regulation of corporate sustainability.

Join us on October 17 <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Finfo.ivalua.com%2Fe3t%2FCtc%2FWW%2B113%2Fc2Pz504%2FVWH9PP58-qtHVHGJnb1tHcrwW8SvcRS5lK3CSMZjDVW5nR32W69t95C6lZ3ksW3npsC21GNW0hW83KNs22K2g_LW82zcsZ8hDChDW6X6CDx8VQjVGW8_tFNQ594NdlW6c2MGT5XtnZ2W3zsg8X2B-6zjV7nBwg8-nRc5W2rNNHw5B127_W7r9JDS791WP0W8Z5ZYW5GKq2fVH-X3h4TtQb8W6kvR0T92RH3YW8b6TNY5khs_nVZFjXP6d1dZVVX8dMB3DcWYyW4cPhn97TlkJ2W2VQcFT6b23YvW3sSrPr8B9HY_W5Xq70C4QhhzGW1d-4HK2GJzX-W4fnSqy48_fhkW13R3hv7KjVMMW3s3nQ72gKZKwW95Mtk373hd7cW2_PrVY45jv89W2xsJjJ41BpV1W9lpmps660vqqW64LhFZ5NlPmmW205CzC4zXnDkW1l7Tjt1qyg7yW7rG3mz41c-SHW3cHGNl1g2j0-N30B_4wp-r1mN93L_bvw_Q1fW1jpRD_4McS1kf2_ZYvH04&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ce8a259d5019b41d68a1208dce3a96523%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638635563893984009%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=ktZl8xRDSm7XrqhpTGPYvwSlYrs%2BFQV84eGuA5yaL2A%3D&reserved=0> for an insightful webinar where we will delve into the details of CS3D including objectives, scope, and timeline for compliance.

chunks.text:
7C&sdata=ktZl8xRDSm7XrqhpTGPYvwSlYrs%2BFQV84eGuA5yaL2A%3D&reserved=0> for an insightful webinar where we will delve into the details of CS3D including objectives, scope, and timeline for compliance.

Key takeaways:

*	Understanding the fundamentals elements of CS3D and its relevance to procurement
*	Integrating CS3D in procurement processes
*	Practical tips for getting started along with industry leading practices
*	Common challenges in adopting CS3D
*	How technology can enable an effective transition and expose value levers.
